content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0), a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0), and a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that connects the Furnace to the Burner Mining Drill

### Storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of three Wooden Chests at positions(x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=44.5, y=-81.5), and (x=43.5, y=-79.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a furnace
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace
- Check your inventory for the required items before attempting to insert them into a furnace

### Errors when extracting items from a drill
- Ensure the drill is not blocked by items on the ground before attempting to extract items
- Clear any items blocking the drill's output before attempting to extract items

### Errors when placing entities
- No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution logs

### Errors when moving to a position
- No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution logs

### Errors when harvesting resources
- No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution logs

### Errors when picking up items from the ground
- No errors of this type were encountered in the given execution logs
